employee_external_id.notes: Map Flip employee_external_id to Rippling worker_id - both represent employee identifiers

absence_type_external_id.notes: Map Flip absence_type_external_id to Rippling leave_type_id - both represent leave/absence type identifiers

status.notes: Direct mapping but enum values differ: Flip uses REQUESTED/APPROVED, Rippling uses PENDING/APPROVED/REJECTED

start_date.notes: Direct mapping - both use date format (string)

end_date.notes: Direct mapping - both use date format (string)

start_half_day.notes: Flip boolean maps to Rippling time field - need business logic to convert half_day boolean to appropriate time

end_half_day.notes: Flip boolean maps to Rippling time field - need business logic to convert half_day boolean to appropriate time

amount.notes: Flip amount (days/hours) needs conversion to Rippling minutes - requires unit conversion logic

unit.notes: Flip unit (DAYS/HOURS) used with amount for conversion to Rippling minutes

employee_note.notes: Direct mapping - both represent employee-provided comments/reason for absence

processing_context: Rippling Platform API - Leave Request Management. Note: Actual endpoints for leave requests not found in provided API spec, only schemas are defined. May require additional API documentation or different access levels.
implementation_notes: Status enum mapping: Flip REQUESTED -> Rippling PENDING, Flip APPROVED -> Rippling APPROVED
Half-day logic: Convert start_half_day/end_half_day booleans to appropriate time values (e.g., 12:00:00)
Amount/Unit conversion: Convert Flip days/hours to Rippling minutes using appropriate multipliers
Leave request endpoints may be in different API version or require specific permissions
Consider using Rippling's custom objects API if leave endpoints are not available
